title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, November 18, 2021
description: Today is the 82nd birthday of poet, novelist, activist, and feminist Margaret Atwood, who said, "I read for pleasure and that is the moment I learn the most."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the 82nd birthday of poet, novelist, activist, and feminist Margaret Atwood, who said, "I read for pleasure and that is the moment I learn the most."
